text: Nazi mysticism is a commonly held belief that Hitler and the Nazi Party practiced the occult. This idea has been part of popular culture since 1959. There are many documentaries made about this belief. ==Other websites== *https://web.archive.org/web/20091020031109/http://geocities.com/CapitolHill/1404/hitlerengl.html Category:Nazism Category:Occult Category:Religion in Germany
title: Nazi mysticism
